about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Pioneering science education since 2010
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.desc: At Hijack Science Centre, we believe every child has the potential to become a scientist. Our mission is to make science education accessible, engaging, and fun for students of all ages.
